mapper.update: UPDATE pboard SET viewcount = viewcount+1 WHERE board_no=#{board_no}
mapper.select: select r.member_no, r.board_no, b.title, r.board_name, r.content, r.reply_writedate from preply r join pboard b on r.board_no = b.board_no where r.member_no = #{member_no} and (r.content LIKE '%${sword}%') ORDER BY reply_writedate DESC LIMIT ${startIdx},${pageRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) from preply r join pboard b on r.board_no = b.board_no where r.member_no = #{member_no} and (r.content LIKE '%${sword}%')

select l.board_name, l.board_no, b.title, b.viewcount from plike l join pboard b on l.board_name=b.board_name and l.board_no=b.board_no where l.member_no=#{member_no} and (title like '%${sword}%') ORDER BY viewcount DESC LIMIT ${startIdx},${pageRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) from plike l join pboard b on l.board_name=b.board_name and l.board_no=b.board_no where l.member_no=#{member_no} and (title like '%${sword}%')
select p.board_name, p.room_no, p.room_title, p.roommaker_id, p.room_startdate from proom p, proommember pr where p.room_no = pr.room_no and pr.room_participant_no = #{room_participant_no};

select * , (select count(*) from plike l where b.board_no = l.board_no) as likecount , (select count(*) from pdislike dl where b.board_no = dl.board_no) as dislikecount , (select group_concat(hashtag_name) from pcategory c left outer join phashtag h on c.hashtag_no = h.hashtag_no where c.board_no = b.board_no) as hashtag_name from pboard b
board_name = '여행코스'
and title like '%${sword}%'
and content like '%${sword}%'
